name: Christmas E-Card
description:
This Christmas, Santa's helpers are all missing. Supply Santa with Joy and Cheer so that he can finish his presents delivery.

Created for Lost Relic Christmas Challenge, 2022.

Instructions

Click on text prompts and stuff to progress the card.

Credits

Built and coded in GMS2. All artwork hand drawn/painted by me for the challenge.
